35800967.review:
Not much changed for the second UBERMOSH instalment. The same short burst arcade goodness now with a new attack, in the form of a screen-clearing smart bomb triggered by your kill counter. A new top tier gun and a host of other minor tweaks.

About my 27 hours played, I'd say roughly 20 hours were spent chasing the last achievement “Score 600+”. After bagging all the achievements in UBERMOSH, Trip to Vinelands and SWARMRIDERS my old 360 era completist habits had fully kicked in. I was regularly reaching the high 400s to low 500s with no class mods and the warlock mod.
[url=https://youtu.be/p4NjJWOhOWk]My struggle is documented here.[/url]

35316230.review:
Este es uno de esos juegos para aquellos que no sean de echarse partidas largas, es bastante entretenido y te puede ofrecer una dificultad que es muy probable que te enganche un poquito pero a la vez no tanto como para desvelarte con el. Un juego para abrirlo y jugarlo enseguida, tanto si es que estas aburrido o estas descargando otra cosa.
En este juego controlamos a una chica la cual tendra a su mano dos tipos de armas; una de fuego y por otro lado una espada, con la cual se enfrentara a hordas de enemigos y sobrevivir antes de que acaben los 90 segundos. En ese tiempo el jugador tratara de conseguir la mayor cantidad de puntos posibles hasta el final de la ronda.



Sus controles son muy simples y te acostumbraras a ellos enseguida, los controles te los explican el tutorial y a la hora de jugar.

Su soundtrack es muy bueno teniendo musica atrallente.

Sus graficos fueron algo que me encanto (principalmente porque amo los juegos con graficos pixels :v) y encajan bien con el soundtrack.

En temas de la jugabilidad es simple pero entretenida, ofreciendo algunas ''clases'' con distintas formas de jugar e incluso con porsentajes de vida mas reducidos(lo cual le añade un toque mas de dificultad al juego).

En temas de estetica el juego tiene una mezcla de look ´´satanico´´ (con satanico me refiero solo al personaje :v) con un toque de ciberpunk lo cual le da un aspecto fresco.

En temas de precio el juego cuesta ´´por lo general´´ 1,00USD pero yo lo consegui a un %50 de descuento (osea 0,50USD), que en mi opinion es un precio muy accesible para la mayoria de gente.



CALIFICACION: 10/10
Muy recomendable :D

34745019.review:
Hah for a buck this is great. It's about an hour of game play initially but I could see myself going back to it from time to time. Extremely well controlled and fluid combat make it so much fun to play. I think the sword is the weakest part and I had a very difficult time playing with only the sword. It just felt with this close of a camera it was impossible to see what I was running into. Also it felt I should have redirected the bullets back but I took the hit anyway, perhaps a hit box problem.

Anyway this is solid and at some point I'm sure I'll pick up the others in the series.

34672487.review:
UBERMOSH:BLACK is the second game in the UBERMOSH series, which is a fast paced cyberpunk bullet-hell upon which you can slaughter waves of enemies through either shooting, slicing or deflecting for as long as you can. My review for this will be very similar to my review on the first game

Pros:
-Gameplay is still smooth and fast, along with different classes which you can select and master to obtain the best score in each class. The new ability called Brainclap which was introduced in this game is a great addition
-Visually appealing with it's retro cyberpunk feel to it
-Soundtrack is amazing and adds to the atmosphere and pace of the game
-Improved AI, making the game even more challenging than its precursor
-It has Steam Achievements
-It's really cheap at R12 (~$1)

Cons:
-Can't change the volume in-game, which can be pretty annoying as the game is very loud

Overall, this game improves on the previous installment, but still retains the qualities that made UBERMOSH so amazing to play. Worth a look if you are a fan of these type of games
9/10

[code][h1]Accidently Reviewed[/h1]
Free Games? Reviews? Competitions? Amazing Community? We got it all!

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Accidently] Steam Group: AccidentlyReviewed[/url][/code]

34594963.review:
This review will be very similar to my review of UBERMOSH, so keep that in mind.

The second game in the UBERMOSH series, UBERMOSH:BLACK is basically the same as the previous game, but does have a few new features.

Pros
- Fun and fast gameplay
- Good visuals 
- A great soundtrack that gets you pumped while you play
- The same classes from the previous game all make a return as well as a new class, which adds variety to the gameplay
- The new features include a new class, new enemies, and a new weapon. Also, an ability called Brainclap was added, which lets the player take out large swaths of enemies once they reach a certain amount of kills.
- The price

Cons
- No options menu to adjust graphics or sound settings, but the volume can be easily adjusted via Volume Mixer (For Windows users)
- The player automatically picks up whatever gun they walk over which can be annoying, however once you get the best gun in the game it stops happening

Also to note, this game is much more difficult than the previous installment. Enemy AI seems to have been improved, there are less areas to take cover, and the achievements and the title of Blade Saint require many more kills. This isn't necessarily a bad thing, as some may like the challenge, but it may be a reason for some to avoid the game.

Like the first game in the series, I recommend this game to pretty much anyone, largely because of the price. Fans of other top down shooters like Hotline Miami and Nuclear Throne will like this game.

33105716.review: Ubermosh:Black is much more difficult than the first installment in the series.  The enemies seem more aggressive, throwing off your timing, and attacking faster than before.  There's less room for error.  The score goals for the various acheievments have increased significantly.    Although I enjoyed the previous Ubermosh, I found it a bit too easy.  I like the challenge with this one...I like how it forces you to maintain your focus in order to survive.  The control feels more loose than the first game, which can be frustrating, as I find myself over-adjusting to enemy fire all too often, and getting myself killed.  I recommend this game for those who want something they can jump into quickly for short bursts of intense action.

30999943.review:
The blade saint returns.

Ubermosh: Black may be my favorite of the series.

Map still has a defined border and randomly generated land masses that can be used as cover.

New AOE attack adds far more dynamic to the game and really gets you feeling like you can overcome large swaths of enemies.

Slicing bullets and enemies, while blasting the rest to Hell and back will get your blood pumping.

Entire series is worth a purchase. Getting the series on sale is an absolute steal.

30855628.review:
[h1]高難易度アクションSTG２作目[/h1]
[url=store.steampowered.com/sub/95016/]UBERMOSHシリーズ[/url]の２作目
マウスで照準、左クリックで射撃、右クリックで刀で弾を弾く
[u]高難易度と良BGMが特徴のアクションシューティング[/u]です。
ストア動画でピンと来た人にオススメ

内容は前作の[url=store.steampowered.com/app/357070/]UBERMOSH[/url]とほぼ同じ。
変更点は
・キル数で自動発動する全方位ボム"brainclap"の追加
・武器の追加（最上位のアップグレード版）
・クラスの追加

全てのクラスで個別に生き残り実績がある為
全実績解除は難しくなりましたが
brainclap（全方位ボム）があるので前作よりも格段に生き残りやすいです。
数で押し負けて詰むことが減ったいい改善だと思います。

BLACKをプレイするのは前作を全実績解除してからの方がいいかもしれません。

30641510.review:
[h1]Кратко об игре:[/h1]
[b]Продолжение UBERMOSH во всех традициях предшественника.[/b]

[h1]Что тут у нас, в отличие от первой части?[/h1]
[b]Геймплей[/b]
Разнообразился новым классом, новыми врагами и новой способностью Brainclap. Brainclap срабатывает каждое определенное кол-во убийств, распыляя врагов и рассеивая выстрелы. Повысили планку достижений, что о многом говорит. 
[b]Графика и артворк[/b]
Изменился внешний вид персонажа и артворк в меню
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=884771263
[b]Сюжет[/b]
По сюжету прошло 200 лет; главная героиня стала куда сильнее и опаснее. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=885312840]Читать руководство о сюжете этой серии игр.[/url]

30416259.review:
Продолжение игры UBERMOSH
Для тех, кто не в теме, это неплохая аркада - стрелялка с видом сверху, графоном в ретро стиле и динамичной музыкой.
В игре нет ни смысла, ни сюжета, ни конца.
Играя за кибер ниндзю нужно уничтожить как можно больше врагов за отведённое время.
В арсенале есть только меч и пушки, которые можно собирать с убитых врагов.

В основном игра практически и есть первая часть, та же карта, тот же графон, но есть и некоторые изменения. 
- В игру добавили новый класс Catalyst. 
- Добавили что-то вроде псионического взрыва, который при убийстве определённого количества врагов, уничтожает всех на экране. 
- Повысили планку очков необходимых для получения достижений, из-за чего их стало сложнее получить.

В общем игра довольно бодрая.

29617801.review:
The second instalment to the UBERMOSH saga was the one that gave us the brainclap, a move that can easily wipe out enemies after you rack up so many kills.

What's so good about this game then? IT'S UBERMOSH OF COURSE! Who doesn't want to cut bullets and gun down as many enemies as possible? 90 seconds to cause as much chaos as possible. Bring it on.

We're treated to the same heart-pumping soundtrack that made the original so fun, and with a new move and more variety in class mods, what else can you say?

Admittedly it is a bit strange going back to BLACK (and to an extent the original) after blasting around in the open arenas in Vol.3 and WRAITH, but it just means that you have to take a different tactical approach. And I like that.

If you enjoy arcade style cyberpunk shoot-'em-ups or you're looking for a game you can get a quick rush of high-octane action in, this comes highly recommended. All the games in the series do actually.

28369075.review:
This is the first UBERMOSH I tried. I like it. It looks good and sounds good. It's cheap. It's cool. But I have a lot to complain about.

I don't understand what the game is really about. What skill does the game want to test? If it's reaction and twitch, there is the problem with some enemies shooting as soon as they appear on screen from all directions (and enemies coming from north and south gives less time for the player to react). Sometimes they don't shoot and I cannot tell when they will. There isn't any apparent pattern and there is definitely no 'signal' when they are about to shoot. There is also the problem with the player character being too slippery (seems to move in a grid), too fat, and too slow (shooting and slashing has a short recovery period, which is normally fine but frustrating here). 
I considered the possibility that this game is more about planning and positioning but the enemies are too fast for that and the maps are random or at least feels random, then there are the problems from I stated above. 
Sure, I'm not as good at the game as I think I need to be but it feels like a lot of my failures are due to me being unlucky. I think there is a simple solution to most of my complaints: zoom out and/or square map so the player can see more threats as they move (or just minimap), and consistent shooting patterns and/or 'tells' for enemies. 

Also, maybe it's just me but 'best class=no class', which is silly.

ADD: I can't find the volume slider. My ears...

28323706.review:
全成就撒花~
UBERMOSH的续作。新增加一种怪物（此怪物所持有枪支能发射更多的子弹）、一种模式（catalyst，3血，初始带刀，可拾取枪支）、主角增加个每隔一段时间向周围发出一阵轰击的能力（不确定这技能的触发原理，击杀数？时间？）
音乐风格依旧非常震撼，打击感十足
移动依旧有些许发飘，
保留前作的四种模式：
一般（NO）模式：4血，初始带刀，拾取枪支
枪手（GUNNER）模式：3血，不可使用刀，枪支连发子弹
术士（WARLOCK）模式：2血，可使用刀，拾取枪支
剑圣（KENSAI）模式：6血，只能使用刀。
成就要求每个模式达到300分，一个不限模式600分成就（建议在枪手模式下完成），以及一个切换增加怪物量的成就（底边菜单栏第二项）和一项生存到时间结束成就。（随着尸体越堆越多，可能是使得有些卡和画面乱，所以剑圣成就时建议不要换防1-2处。）

26418886.review:
UberMosh:Black 同UberMosh本质上没有任何的区别，只有封面上原本的穿着护甲的春哥换成了穿着深V大胸美女...大概有D的样子..暂且叫她DD姐..

回到游戏本身，游戏的素质非常不错！
核心玩法就像名字上写的一样---狂舞！！！

游戏所有的内容就是：

1.控制DD姐（我实在无法接受游戏中的DD姐和菜单背景中的DD姐的差距...秒杀卖家秀)不断的挥舞手中的荧光酷炫大太刀切开敌人，或者将敌人的子弹反弹回去，亦或者捡起激光枪突突突完成你的鼠标梦想！

2.DD姐一共有5种颜色（职业）可供选择，职业之间区分为以下4点：1.颜色、2.血量、3.可使用武器、4.每击杀多少敌人放一次全屏杀...

3.游戏中除了刀之外还有“散射一定比单射好用多了去了”的枪械系统，某些职业不能使用枪械，而某些职业开场便会拿着个人认为最厉害的散弹枪（WarLock，所有枪械怪物都可掉落）

4.最后游戏中还有“你只需要注意子弹，怪物长什么样完全不重要”的路人怪物。

再搭配上带感的抖腿BMG，以及效果不错的打击感和不贵的价格，非常适合茶余饭后开几局满足一下自己抖M心。

26051640.review: Like a CTRL+C CTRL+V of the first game, only with a few new features like a new weapon and a new class, but it's still a fun game like the first one.

25961922.review: I like to pee on myself while playing this one, haha me like alot to take a big dump on th floor./ i am g ross slob and i like to burp;fart haha. v good

25919018.review: The adrenaline rush from this game stopped me from fapping for 30 minutes.

25875631.review: This is at some point similar to hotline miami-crazy action, respawning all the time, bullets everywhere+slashing and epileptic neon particles. I'm writing this review after 40 minutes of gameplay, but oh boy, those were the most intense 40 minutes of my life! Definitely recommended.

25866075.review:
First, to those looking at this game and wondering if it's as good as the original UBERMOSH - yes, it is, and yet it's a different game.

tldr - Same as the original game, fast-paced, arcade-like, highly decisive game requiring fast thinking and good twitch to glean the Steam achievements (which are DOUBLE the original, at 300 kills per class, and 1 needing 600 kills in 1 game, on any class).

The new stuff includes three primary additions to the game:[list][*]Brainclap - essentially a 360-degree LoS-to-offscreen attack that procs upon reaching a certain number of kills.  This number is slightly different for each class, but from 50 to 60 in all cases.[*]CM Catalyst - Having played the class through several games, I can't find a functional difference between this class and Green (no CM), as they appear to function exactly the same.[*]New advanced/boss alien with a new gun.  Thsi guy is essentially the same as the brownish colored alien with the red gun, but he's a slightly different color and leaves a blue bloodsplat with a different gun - one with a better spread of bullets.  He's my new favorite alien, because I want his gun >:)[/list]

There's also a slightly different color scheme and, as mentioned, achievements for kills are doubled from the original.  This sounds formidable to the point of impossible, but the addition of Brainclap, which kills enemies as well as clearing bullets, and the new alien means there's better tools to do killing.  Playstyle will be very similar, but getting 300 as Kensai is indeed frustrating for a while; it's just about keeping on your game until your skill carries you through on a game where your luck is high, too.

Compared to the first UBER, I give this one similar marks in all categories (soundtrack, intuitive controls, mildly wonky but predictable hitboxes, high replay value), and it's an easy, easy thumbs-up, worth every penny at it's price of $2.99.  If you pick it up this week, go ahead and get the Collection, which is LESS expensive than base price, and includes the first game as well.

Very well done, developer Machado - bravo!

25456977.review:
This is a game you sharpen your reflexes on. It's simply a twitch reaction top-down shooter and it makes no attempt to be anything other than that. There are a handful of classes for small bit of variance in how you'll spend the next few seconds and it's easy to dial into with its art style and music.

You won't be racking up countless hours in this game, but the time you do spend is very focused and highly entertaining.

25355832.review:
Pure bloody combat!
The second UBERMOSH game with new features like the psionic BRAINCLAP, new miniboss (and his green gun), more enemies and achievements.

Instant Classic!

24978535.review:
[b]Here's the thing: there are three [i]UBERMOSH[/i] games (the original, BLACK, and VOL 3) - if you like one, you will like them all since they are virtually identical save for some very minor tweaking.[/b]

What can I say about the [i]UBERMOSH[/i] series?

1. They are [i]very[/i] indie, and have a lot of character.
2. They are quite simple games; definately a one-trick-pony as far as mechanics go. No RPG elements or anything like that. The first minute of playtime will be exactly the same as the 30th hour of playtime, except you may be better at it.
3. IMO there should only be one game, and not three, but hey they are cheap.
4. Your only goal is score-chasing.

[b]Yeah, the series is overly simple, but they are fun to play in short bursts and definately have great indie feel.[/b]

24700918.review:
Mild recommendation! 

There isn't a lot too this game, as it doesn't have a ton of content, and I got bored of it pretty quick. It does have a great attitude though, I guess that goes far, and great music.  I bought both games for 3 bucks I think so I can't complain. On the otherhand I don't know if I'll put more into an hour into it. This is a good attempt at a great game but just doesn't engage me. Another downside is that the camera is too close to the player, it seems almost more luck than anything else whether you can survive. Most games last 1-2 minutes. 

Bottom line: get if you like this sort of game.

24529979.review:
Keep in mind that I have not played the original Ubermosh -

This game is an action-packed ragefest in a small package. It's only basically 1 level with some slight random variations, plus a variety of classes to choose from the change the gameplay a bit. The achievements available are listed right on the menu screen to motivate you to open a can of whoop-ass on the hoards trying to murder you. Seriously, I found them extremely motivating. The soundtrack is worth noting for sure - I don't know how many tracks there are, but the music doesn't get old even after a 2 hour play session. In fact, the music is one of the only things that kept me sane while I was on the  verge of rage-quitting, so there's that.

This game is truly bullet hell (veterans of the genre need to try the "hardboiled" mode") but with an interesting game mechanic added that takes the gameplay beyond simply dodging enemy projectiles. 

All in all, this game is dope. I don't know why I waited so long to buy it. If you are a competitive person who likes to rack up a high score, this game will provide you with several hours of gameplay for a low price. If you catch this game on sale, there's no reason not to buy it!

If you want to get an idea of the rage-inducing quality of the game, check out my gameplay video below. Don't say you weren't warned! :p

https://youtu.be/ZXJgunlU2Cg

23859140.review:
[h1] 竜神の剣を喰らえ[/h1]

以下来自Cowlevel奶牛关 https://cowlevel.net 的EEEEHENTAI写~以上仅代表个人观点！欢迎加好友和讨论!~!

Cult bullet大概就是这款游戏的精髓，非常快的节奏，厚重的射击手感，以及弹子弹时那一刹那间的快感，这游戏都做的非常非常好~！
游戏中四个模式，区别就在于游戏敌人出来的波数量，以及携带武器的区别。
在你击杀到一定量时，你自己会释放一种清理全场的技能，我自己玩的好几把都被这个给救了QAQ

[h1] 缺点:[/h1]
非常单调的游戏内容，几乎没有任何剧情（上来就是干！）
手感有点点飘！我自己在玩的时候还会花屏! 不知道为什么！！

但是根据目前的价格~!这款游戏还是很值得加一！并且适合喜欢挑战自己反应极限的玩家!~

以上来自Cowlevel奶牛关 https://cowlevel.net 的EEEEHENTAI写~以上仅代表个人观点！欢迎加好友和讨论!~!

23286229.review:
인디게임 우버모쉬의 후속작 '우버모쉬:블랙' 입니다. 게임방식과 컨텐츠는 뭐 전작과 다르지 않습니다.

 + 새롭게 추가된 '일정킬 도달 시 주변적 싹쓸이'로 전작보다 도전과제 따기가 용이
 + 전작보다 더욱 많은 적들이 쏟아져 나와 짜릿하게 느껴지는 타격감
 + 음치듬따다듬따듬따다듬따 역시 중독성이 돋보이는 OST
 + 게임모드 하나가 더 추가됨(근데 노클래스 모드랑 뭐가 다른지 모르겠어)

 - 역시나 컨텐츠의 부재로 도전과제 다 깨고 나면 할 일이 없다.
 - 도전과제를 완료하기 위한 적 격파수가 늘어서 플레이 초반일 경우 심리적으로 더 힘들게 느껴지는 현상이 있다.
 - KENSAI 도전과제의 난이도가 유일하게 전작보다 더 괴랄해졌다.

 만약 세일기간 때 샀다면 가성비에 만족할 수 있는 제품이나, 그렇지 않다면 구매할 필요성을 딱히 느끼지 못할 게임이다.

23214487.review:
It's one of those games i've bought because it's timewasting, addictive and irritating in a... keyboard smashing kind of way, where you just wanna tear off the last hair that remains, when you out of nowhere gets shot to pieces with just a few seconds left of a round...

It's challenging in a devilish way because it's fast paced with no real idea of you really just got hit or not. Normally you can see the shot hit you, but loosing 3 / 3 lifes within 5 seconds of a crowd? That's just crazy... Also, the shot's hit you before actually hitting you, which kind of pisses you off... It's like the shots hits you another character length away? 

I highly recommend the game, for anyone up to the challenge... Beating your own score that is :)

I do however have a few cons, or well not cons but something im missing!

- Remove the badges from the main screen, it's steam achievements and there you should look it up.
- Adjustable stuff like zoom in and out on the screen would be awesome, not a lot, but still something that i miss.
- Having the enemies shoot on a further distance instead of close up. It's a gun for crying out loud! (refer to kensei class)
- Instead of personal best, share the score online with those on your friends list or more...

Probably more, but it's just on top of my head.

Great overall game for the price :)

우버모쉬의 후속작 겸 확장팩인 우버모쉬:검정입니다.
전작보다 쪼오끔 늘어난 시야 덕택에 빼꼼샷에 얻어맞을 일은 줄어들었으나
AI특성상 중거리 내에서만 쏘기위해 와리가리하는 성향이 강한데 적의 수도 그만큼 늘어서 되려 와리가리샷에 얻어맞을 확률이 더 높아졌습니다. 그나마 이건 어느정도 컨트롤로 극복할 수 있으니 넘어가지만
클래스모드 중 켄세이는 좀 씨부랄 점수 올리기도 더러운데 검 휘두르는 속도 상승이나 승룡권 이런걸 주면 모를까 목숨 6개로 뭐하라고 주는 겁니까?
뭐 남는 목숨으로 빵이라도 사먹으라는걸까요? 도전과제 하기도 개같네
그래도 게임 플레이 자체는 스피디하고 타격감이 찰집니다. 주간 미션, 일간 미션, 맵에디터 이런게 있었으면 좀 더 플탐을 늘릴 수 있겠지만, 이 제작사가 그런걸 생각할지는 모르겠네요.
그래도 게임 자체는 재밌으니 추천 드립니다.

22830995.review:
Ubermosh é um jogo bastante desafiador. A ação é frenética com hordas e mais hordas de inimigos aparecendo a todo instante. É preciso lutar bastante para sobreviver até o tempo acabar e bater os recordes. Cada vez mais os inimigos aparecem. Você começa apenas com um "sabre de luz" e ao derrotar um inimigo ele deixa cair uma arma que o jogador pode pegar e usar. Há diferentes tipos de armas para diferentes tipos de inimigos. Mas o que mais acho legal mesmo é a espada de luz que a personagem tem equipada e é uma arma não removivel. É muito divertido usa-la para partir os inimigos. Mas legal ainda é cortas os projeteis inimigos e faze-los voltar até eles. A música também é um elemento que aumenta a imersão do jogo pois combina muito com a ação que se passa na tela. 

O jogo é muito curto. É mais para aqueles que gostam de uma diversão rápida (mas que pode se estender enquanto você  tenta bater seus recordes) e um bom desafio.

22819558.review:
Ubermosh: Black 

Pros:

- Achievements
- Full controller support

A trilha sonora é muito épica e adiciona um bom felling ao game.

Cons:

21697400.review: This has to be the most intense game on Steam. Every instance is loaded with a blur of Matrix worthy bullet dodging, endless pools of blood, and the thunder of the music pounding through your very soul. Finishing an event always ends with you on the edge of your seat, eyes locked to the screen, and your heart pumping adrenaline through you veins, as a rush of exhilaration comes over you at climax, with a victory so satisfying, you have to do it again.

21650436.review:
Trilha sonora sensacional! A resposta do controle vibrando é animal! Ritmo frenético! 

Jogando com Gunner, para mim, o jogo começa quando pego a arma mais potente. Quando pego essa arma parece que dá um click no cérebro e entro em modo automático. No fluxo total! O jogo te deixa frenético e totalmente concentrado.

Uma sessão rápida no Ubermosh:Black é pura diversão! Depois de marcar 269, parei pra dar um descanso pro coração!

O jogo está redondo! Sem contar que o Black me traz a mesma sensação de quando eu jogava Quake 3 arena e Unreal Tournament.

Ubermosh: Black é adrenalina na veia!

Joguei todas as espansões do jogo.
Esse ultimo, versão black, é a mais foda de todas,
Você tem que entender que trata-se de um jogo arcade, morreu, começa denovo.
Ficou muito mais dinâmico.
O esquema é matemático.
Mão esquerda, do WASD, fica no avoid.
Mão direita, mouse do sabre, para rebater o que o avoi não consegue prever, e tiro. (ou morrer)
Good Luck.
PS. Eu e meus amigos inventamos um multiplayer. (um player fica no teclado com o avoid, e outro jogador fica no mouse) Esse sistema permite diversão entre varios jogadores em um mesmo computador.
Joguei uma madrugada inteira com dois amigos em um mesmo computador.

21336947.review:
ubermoshのブラックバージョン
まるでロック○ンエグ○３ブラックのような、コンテンツの追加バージョン。
基本的な内容はubermosh無印と一緒、ただ主人公の職業（クラス）によって攻略の仕方が大きく変わってくる。

でも大体は無印と一緒で、走り回るより立ち位置が重要に感じる。
走り回ると、脇腹を死角から撃たれるので、反復横飛びするような小刻みな動きと、物陰に隠れながら
長く出来るだけ時間制限ギリギリまで持ちこたえる方法を見出すほうがいいと感じる。

クラスによってこれが結構重要で、ガンナークラスでガンガン前に出てしまうと、ブレードで敵の弾丸を返すことが出来ないので
余裕で死にます。物陰に隠れて、タイミングを見計らうことが必要だと感じた。

ケンシクラスだと走り回ってオラオラ突っ込んでおｋだが、行き過ぎると返しきれないので、これも状況に応じて身を引く必要もあり難しい。

ubermosh自体がクセのある作品なので、とっつきにくさはある。
個人的にスマホアプリで配信されたりしたら、手軽でずっとプレイできるのになと感じる。
でもやっぱりゲームのコンセプト、ブレードで敵弾をはじく気持ち良さ、サイバーパンクの世界観デザインも魅力を感じるそんな作品である。

40345814.review:
Bom jogo.

O jogo consiste em sobreviver.
Com um nivel de dificuldade extremo e uma jogabilidade bem simples o jogo tem um desafio interessante.
Escolha sua arma. Seja atirando nos inimigos ou usando a espada rebatendo o fogo dos adversarios.
Arma 1 - Espada (rebate fogo inimigo)
Arma 2 - Bazuka 1 tiro
Arma 3 - Laser 2 tiros
Arma 4 - Laser 3 tiros
Arma 5 - Laser 4 tiros

Existe uma possibilidade de nascer com 2, 3, 4 ou 6 vidas.. 
Claro que a arma que ira pegar sera proporcional ao numero de vidas escolhido. Exemplo se escolher 6 vidas ira comecar somente com uma espada.

Pós
- Jogabilidade.
- Armas legais.
- Trilha Sonora adequada.

Contras
- Nao existe parede nas laterais tornando impossivel encostar nos cantos ou fugir de inimigos de fora do ''ring''.
- Dificuldade muito alta.
- Campo de visao muito limitado tornando impossivel ver os tiros adversarios chegando de alguns pontos.
- Espada muito lenta.

O jogo e bem interessante porem um nome adequado para o game? Impossivel fugir!
Nao tem para onde correr.. Nao existe bug que voce possa fazer para tentar ganhar algum tipo de vantagem ou proteçao. Tem que ganhar na raça.. Um desafio legal porem bem limitado. A versao 1 e 2 do jogo sao praticamente identicas e por esse motivo usarei a mesma analisa para ambos. Nao achei nada de diferente alem do MENU principal. As opçoes do game sao iguais. Caso alguem jogue porfavor me corrija caso esteja errado.

Recomendo somente em promoçao. Jogo e bom porem muito limitado e praticamente impossivel ganhar sem tentar 8948990345x...

Duvidas ou sugestoes? Postem aqui. :D

40286023.review: Non mi sono mai incazzato così tanto per un videogioco. Soundtrack meravigliosa. Consigliatissimo!

39617177.review: It's the first game but with more enemies and slightly higher difficulty. You now have an auto-bomb that activates every 50 kills or so, and clears nearby enemies and bullets. As good as (if not better) than its predecessor.
